directions: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add okra and cook, stirring occasionally, until bright green, 3 to 4 minutes. Push the okra to the sides and add 1 teaspoon oil and garlic to the center of the skillet; cook for 1 minute. Stir the garlic and okra together until combined.
Serve hot, seasoned with salt and pepper.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Sauteed Okra
